name: musketeer
rules: Beats Pikemen. Advanced Rifling - During Rounds 5-6, beats Pikemen and, if successful, kills an additional unit of your choice.

name: pikemen
rules: Beats Cavalry and, if successful, prevents your opponent from playing Cavalry next card. If hen has only Cavalry, he routes.

name: calvary
rules: Beats Musketeers and, if successful, forces your opponent to discard two additional infantry. If he does not have two infantry, he routes. Additionally, if you have 2x your opponent's cards, he routes.
